original_title: Naked City: Justice with a Bullet
overview: A pair of taxi-driving NYC detectives take up the case of tourists who are robbed of their money and luggage by a shady limo driver. Things get dicey when the tourists accidentally get mixed up in a drug dealer's murder and money heist, while the detectives go after a hit man posing as a friend from the `hood'.
tagline: New York City Is The Heart Of The World. And The Blood Flows Freely.
title: Naked City: Justice with a Bullet
